Subject: Hands on Python for Everything and Everybody
Description: Join MDLUG and friends to walk through an introductory course on building small useful scripts in Python. Get your hands dirty in the fertile soil that is sprouting some of the most interesting developments in machine learning, server scripting and automation! Noteworthy addendum! There will be 20 laptops available in the lab. First come, first served.  Speakers include:Gib Nichols, Daniel Dugan - Track: Tech  - Duration: 1 hour and 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
